# p6-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                     | Type                                                                     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disabled - If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button. | `boolean`                                                                | `false`     |
| `mode`     | `mode`     | Mode - set the mode of the button                               | `"danger" \| "default" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'default'` |
| `outlined` | `outlined` | Outlined                                                        | `boolean`                                                                | `false`     |
| `type`     | `type`     | Type - type of the button.                                      | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                        | `'submit'`  |
| `waiting`  | `waiting`  | Waiting - If set, shows a waiting/busy indicator                | `boolean`                                                                | `false`     |
